content.query:
select * from params.datausers
select * from params.ConfigUser

insert into params.datausers (usuario, fecha, type, pdfname, password, )

update params.datausers
set password = '1233491047'


delete from params.datausers 


select 
    prm.usuario,
    prm.fecha,
    prm.type,
    prm.pdfname,
    usr.password,
    prm.procesado
from params.datausers prm
inner join params.ConfigUser usr on (prm.usuario = usr.[user])
where usr.password is not null and prm.procesado = 0
